title: Brand Automation
description: Agentic workers create brand philosophy and assets. Users feed in rough thoughts about a new brand and this workflow outputs brand assets such as social media posts, tag lines, etc.
pitch: Transform rough brand ideas into comprehensive brand assets through intelligent automation, streamlining the brand development process.
challenge: Creating an AI system that can understand brand concepts and generate coherent, professional brand assets that maintain consistency and quality across different outputs.
development: Developed AI agents specialized in different aspects of brand development, from philosophy to visual identity to marketing materials.
outcome: An automated brand development system that reduces time and cost while maintaining quality and consistency in brand asset creation.
